source: The film has grossed over $552 million worldwide, becoming the eighth highest-grossing film of 2022.
target: The film has made more than $552 million at the box office and is currently the eighth most successful movie of 2022.

source: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
target: Abi (played by Bolu Essien) had a difficult beginning at a top Lagos advertising agency. || Despite this, she was promoted to become the temporary manager when the original manager had to go to a different branch.

source: Born on September 27, 1940 in Keekozhur, a small hamlet in the Pathanamthitta district, in the south Indian state of Kerala, Thomas Mathew did his education at Christian College, Chengannur, and Maharaja's College, Ernakulam, and started his career as a lecturer at his alma mater, Christian College, Chengannur.
target: Thomas Mathew was born on September 27, 1940 in Keekozhur, a small hamlet in the Pathanamthitta district, in the south Indian state of Kerala, Thomas Mathew did his education at Maharaja's College, Ernakulam and Christian College, Chengannur, where he was a very good student.

source: Divided into sections pertaining to each season and covering self-reliance, growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness, and with photos and illustrations evocative of the great outdoors, A Wilder Life shows that getting in touch with nature is possible.
target: It is divided into sections pertaining to each season and covering self-reliance, growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness. || With photos and illustrations evocative of the great outdoors, " A Wilder Life " shows that getting in touch with nature is possible.

source: On the fifth day of flight, November 20, 2022, at 19:09 UTC, the Orion spacecraft entered the Lunar sphere of influence, thus the Moon's gravitational force became stronger than Earth's relative to the spacecraft.
target: On the fifth day of flight, November 20, 2022, at 19:09 UTC, the Orion spacecraft entered the Lunar sphere of influence, so the Moon's gravitational force became stronger than Earth's relative to the spacecraft.

source: A winter storm causes record-breaking low temperatures and leaves more than 80 people dead across North America.
target: A winter storm causes record-breaking low temperatures and leaves more than 80 people dead across North America.

source: The sentence included a fine of $400, or $100 for each count of fraud, and a three-year supervised release after the prison term.
target: You will receive a fine of $400 for the fraud or $100 for each count. || You will also be under supervised release for three years after the prison term.

source: Bone has published numerous books including Fantastic Fungi Community Cookbook (2021), which includes recipes by wild mushroom foragers, mycologists, and chefs specializing in mushroom-based dishes.
target: Bone has published many books including " Fantastic Fungi Community Cookbook ", which includes recipes by wild mushroom foragers, mycologists, and chefs specializing in mushroom-based dishes.

source: Following the release of Wednesday, Wednesday Addams's dance from the series and its fan recreations to Lady Gaga's song "Bloody Mary" went viral on video sharing service TikTok.
target: After the release of Wednesday, Wednesday Addams’s dance from the show and its fan’s recreations of Lady Gaga’s song “Bloody Mary” became very popular on TikTok.

source: The film received positive reviews from critics, with praise towards Coogler's direction, the action sequences, production and costume design, the cast's performances (particularly those of Wright, Gurira, Huerta, and Bassett), emotional weight, musical score, and its tributes to Boseman, although the runtime received some criticism.
target: Film critics praised Coogler’s direction, action scenes, production and costume design, the cast’s performances, emotional weight, musical score, and tributes to Boseman. || Some critics disliked the length of the movie.

source: The film received positive reviews from critics, with praise towards Coogler's direction, the action sequences, production and costume design, the cast's performances (particularly those of Wright, Gurira, Huerta, and Bassett), emotional weight, musical score, and its tributes to Boseman, although the runtime received some criticism.
target: Critics praised Coogler's directing, action sequences, production, costume design, the cast's performances (especially those of Wright, Gurira, Huerta, and Bassett), the emotional weight, music, and tributes to Boseman. || However, they criticized its long runtime.

source: Once inaugurated in January 2023, she will become the first female Governor of Massachusetts as well as the first openly lesbian woman and third openly LGBT person (after Kate Brown and Jared Polis) to take office as governor of a U.S. state.
target: She will officially start her position as Governor of Massachusetts in January 2023. || When this happens, she will become the first female Governor of Massachussets. || She will also be the first openly lesbian woman and third openly LGBT person to take office as governor of a U.S state.

source: Further important aspects of Fungi in Art relate to preservation of artworks from fungal decay and contamination, as well as initiatives fostering and supporting works able to stimulate dialogues between mycologists (fungal researchers), artists, and society (as for example from the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society or works encouraged and supported by the Fungi Foundation).
target: Fungi in Art is important for its role in preserving artworks from fungal decay and contamination. || It also supports dialogues between mycologists, artists, and society through initiatives like the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society and other projects supported by the Fungi Foundation.

source: In more recent practice, between the announcement of the nomination and the start of hearings, the Judiciary Committee undertakes an investigative stage in which committee members and their staffs prepare for the hearings by looking over the background of the nominees and relevant issues.
target: When the hearings start after nominations, the Judiciary Committee members and their staff look at the background of nominees.

source: The Indonesian government raises the volcanic alert status to the highest level after Semeru in East Java erupts, forcing the evacuation of around 2,000 people.
target: The Indonesian government raised the volcanic alert status to its highest level following the eruption of Semeru in East Java. || This eruption forced around 2,000 people to evacuate.

source: According to anonymous sources cited by The Wall Street Journal, FTX had lent $10 billion of its customer assets to Alameda Research in 2022, and Alameda CEO Caroline Ellison disclosed to other Alameda employees that she, Sam Bankman-Fried, Gary Wang, and Nishad Singh knew about that decision.
target: According to anonymous sources quoted by The Wall Street Journal, FTX had loaned USD 10 billion of its customer assets to Alameda Research in 2022, and Alameda CEO Caroline Ellison disclosed to other Alameda employees that she, Sam Bankman-Fried, Gary Wang, and Nishad Singh knew about that decision.

source: In southwestern Ontario, Highway 401 was closed for much of December 23 between London and Tilbury, west of Chatham, due to about 100 vehicles, including numerous tractor trailers, being involved in multiple collisions, while Highway 402 was closed between London and Sarnia because of a 50-vehicle pileup and deteriorating conditions.
target: Due to multiple collisions, Highway 401 was closed for much of December 23 between London and Tilbury in southwestern Ontario. || Highway 402 was also closed between London and Sarnia due to a large accident and bad weather.

source: Before Bankman-Fried's wealth eroded in November 2022, Bankman-Fried was a major donor to Democratic Party candidates.
target: Before Bankman-Fried lost all of his money in November 2022, he was a very important donor to the Democratic Party.

source: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 on progressives and liberals, although Biden had previously rejected calls to "defund the police", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.
target: Republicans blamed the increase in violent crime in 2020 and 2021 on Democrats. || However, Biden has refused to “defund the police”, a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.

source: On November 9, Fetterman was projected as the winner of the election by media outlets.
target: On Novermber 9, media outlets predicted Fetterman would win the US Senate election in Pennsylvania.

source: Argentine footballer Lionel Messi's Instagram post containing photos of him lifting the FIFA World Cup Trophy and celebrating with the Argentina team after winning the 2022 FIFA World Cup two days prior becomes the social networking service's most-liked post after reaching over 56 million likes, surpassing the previous record held by the Instagram egg.
target: Lionel Messi’s Instagram post of him lifting the world cup trophy and celebrating with Argentina became Instagram’s new most-liked photo, reaching over 56 million likes. || The previous record was held by the Instagram egg.

source: Unlike other large U.S. airlines which mostly use hub-and-spoke systems, Southwest uses point-to-point operations and underwent a massive crew scheduling "meltdown" because most of its pilots and flight attendants were out of position, which resulted in massive numbers of flight cancellations persisting for days after the worst weather had subsided and other airlines had largely recovered.
target: Other U.S. airlines use hub-and-spoke systems of operations while Southwest uses point-to-point operations. || Southwest had a big problem with crew scheduling because most of its pilots and flight attendants were not where they were supposed to be. || This caused a lot of flights to be canceled for days after the weather got better.

source: The Supreme Court of the United States rules 5–4 to maintain Title 42 of the U.S. Code, allowing the government to remove persons who have recently been in a country where an infectious disease was present.
target: The Supreme Court of the United States rules 5-9 to keep Title 42 of the U.S. Code. || This allows the government to remove persons who have recently been in a country where an infectious disease was present.

source: Born on April 27, 1944, in Detroit, Michigan, Barnes was regularly mistreated by his alcoholic parents, with him claiming that his mother had attempted to miscarry by ingesting a quantity of drugs.
target: He was born in Detroit, Michigan.

source: In southwestern Ontario, Highway 401 was closed for much of December 23 between London and Tilbury, west of Chatham, due to about 100 vehicles, including numerous tractor trailers, being involved in multiple collisions, while Highway 402 was closed between London and Sarnia because of a 50-vehicle pileup and deteriorating conditions.
target: In southwestern Ontario, Highway 401 was closed for much of December 23 between London and Tilbury, west of Chatham, because of about 100 vehicles being involved in multiple collisions. || Highway 402 was closed between London and Sarnia because of a 50-vehicle pileup.

source: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
target: Earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes. || The current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.

source: In time Eliot relocated to Washington, D.C., first as director of the National Capital Park and Planning Commission until 1933, involved in the development of the National Mall, then until 1943 as Director of the National Resources Planning Board, which formed part of the Public Works Administration.
target: In time, Eliot relocated to Washington, D.C., first as director of the National Capital Park and Planning Commission until 1933, involved in the development of the National Mall, then until 1943 as Director of the National Resources Planning Board, which formed part of the Public Works Administration.

source: Musk also announced the creation of a "content moderation council" with diversified viewpoints to determine how the platform would handle free speech, and declared a moratorium on "major content decisions or account reinstatements" until then.
target: Musk also said he would create a "content moderation council" with people with different views to decide how the platform should handle free speech. || He said he would not make any major content decisions or changes until then.

source: A high-profile affair at the time, the impeachment pitted the two major United States political parties of the era against each other amid a battle between the parties over, among other things, what the role of Federal courts should look like.
target: The impeachment was a high-profile affair at the time. || The impeachment pitted the two major United States political parties of the era against each other amid a battle between the parties over, among other things, what the role of Federal courts should look like.

source: The Indonesian government raises the volcanic alert status to the highest level after Semeru in East Java erupts, forcing the evacuation of around 2,000 people.
target: The Indonesian government raises the volcanic alert status to the highest level after Mount Semeru in East Java erupts, forcing the evacuation of around 2,000 people.

source: The Royal College of Nursing begins the largest strike action in the history of the National Health Service amid a dispute with the government over a pay increase for nurses.
target: The Royal College of Nursing was fighting with the government because they wanted nurses to get paid more. || This led to the largest strike the National Health Service had ever seen.

source: With the loss of US Naval Base Philippines in the Philippines campaign of 1941 and 1942, Hawaiian became the US Navy's main base for the early part of the island-hopping Pacific War against the Empire of Japan.
target: With the loss of US Naval Base Philippines in the Philippines campaign of 1941 and 1942, Hawaiian became the U.S. Navy's main base for the early part of the Pacific War against the Empire of Japan.

source: England are the reigning T20 World Cup holders, having beaten Pakistan in the 2022 final, winning their second title.
target: England won their second title by defeating Pakistan in the 2022 T20 World Cup final, making them the reigning champions.

source: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP, where they are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.
target: An activist hiding his identity said the Egyptian authorities were carrying out random detentions ahead of COP. || They are randomly stopping people and inspecting their mobile phones to look for any evidence of dissent.

source: Described as a darkly comedic bio-pic, Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner?" with Fogel also on board to direct.
target: Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner? || ".

source: In the opening game of their group, they defeated a much fancied Argentina side 2-1, ending an Argentine unbeaten streak of 36 games dating back to 2019.
target: They defeated Argentina 2-1, ending Argentina’s winning streak of 36 games.

source: In time Eliot relocated to Washington, D.C., first as director of the National Capital Park and Planning Commission until 1933, involved in the development of the National Mall, then until 1943 as Director of the National Resources Planning Board, which formed part of the Public Works Administration.
target: Eliot moved to Washington, D.C. and worked in various positions related to the improvement of the city. || From 1933-1943, he was Director of the National Capital Park and Planning Commission, and also worked on the development of the National Mall. || After that, he was Director of the National Resources Planning Board, a part of the Public Works Administration.

source: Divided into sections pertaining to each season and covering self-reliance, growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness, and with photos and illustrations evocative of the great outdoors, A Wilder Life shows that getting in touch with nature is possible.
target: It covers topics such as growing and gardening, cooking, health and beauty, and wilderness. || A Wilder Life shows that getting in touch with nature is possible.

source: Until 1939, Crawshay-Williams worked as a music critic before relocating in 1942 to Portmeirion, North Wales, where he taught English, French, and mathematics.
target: Until 1939, Crawshay-Williams worked as a music critic. || In 1942 he moved to Portmeirion, North Wales, where he taught English, French, and mathematics.

source: Musk also announced the creation of a "content moderation council" with diversified viewpoints to determine how the platform would handle free speech, and declared a moratorium on "major content decisions or account reinstatements" until then.
target: Musk announced the formation of a "content moderation council" with different opinions to decide how the platform should deal with free speech. || He also imposed a "major content decision or account reinstatement" moratorium until the council is formed.

source: In a difficult situation, it encouraged him to study Graphic Design in 2007, and he's been since as a Cinematographer in the film industry, also his have a lot of experience with photography and experience in the field of graphic design.
target: A hard situation encouraged him to study Graphic Design in 2007. || Since then, he’s been a Cinematographer in the film industry. || He also has a lot of experience with photography and graphic design.

source: In southwestern Ontario, Highway 401 was closed for much of December 23 between London and Tilbury, west of Chatham, due to about 100 vehicles, including numerous tractor trailers, being involved in multiple collisions, while Highway 402 was closed between London and Sarnia because of a 50-vehicle pileup and deteriorating conditions.
target: Highway 401 between London and Tilbury, west of Chatham, was closed on December 23. || It was caused by around 100 vehicles, including multiple tractor trailers, getting into various accidents. || On the same day, Highway 402 closed between London and Sarnia, resulting from a large pileup involving 50 vehicles, plus worsening weather.

source: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
target: Unlike the first movie, Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror movie centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.

source: The Supreme Court of the United Kingdom unanimously denies the Scottish government the right to hold a second referendum on Scottish independence from the United Kingdom without approval from the British government.
target: The Supreme Court of the UK ruled unanimously that the Scottish government does not have the authority to organize a second Scottish independence referendum without permission from the British government.

source: The DC Native History Project was established to work with local tribe members to gain further understanding and recognition of the Anacostan heritage of the region, and to create an interactive map of Washington, D.C. with identified original village sites and the locations of artifact excavations.
target: The DC Native History Project was created to collaborate with indigenous people from the area and to bring awareness to the Anacostan culture of the region. || They are also making an interactive map of Washington, D.C. that shows the original village sites and places where artifacts were discovered.

source: In a 233–191 bipartisan vote, the U.S. House of Representatives passes a bill that would allow Puerto Rico to have its first ever binding referendum to decide whether the unincorporated territory should become a state, an independent nation or an independent nation with free association.
target: In a bipartisan vote, the US House of Representatives passed a bill allowing Puerto Ricans to vote for the first time on statehood, self-rule, or self-rule with free association.

source: The last president to run after leaving office was Theodore Roosevelt, who came in second in the 1912 election as the presidential nominee of the Progressive Party, although Herbert Hoover did briefly seek the Republican presidential nomination at several national conventions subsequent to leaving office in 1933.
target: The last president to run after leaving office was Theodore Roosevelt.

source: The Iranian team notably made headlines in their opening match against England after refusing to sing the national anthem in solidarity with the Mahsa Amini protests, with some Iranian supporters cheering against their own team or boycotting their team amidst the ongoing protests as they felt the team was representing the government.
target: The Iranian team made headlines in their first game against England. || They showed support for the Mahsa Amini protests by refusing to sing the national anthem. || Some Iranian supporters did not cheer for Iran or boycotted their country’s team because they believed that the team was representing the government.

source: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
target: The 2022 Peruvian political protests will be held on the same day as a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the former president of Peru, Pedro Castillo. || The demonstrations were organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples.

source: The sentence included a fine of $400, or $100 for each count of fraud, and a three-year supervised release after the prison term.
target: The sentence was a 400$ fine and a three-year supervised release after jail.
